Sentencas: With an aim of reducing the operation temperature of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), we examined the feasibility of Sc2O3-ZrO2 (SSZ) as electrolyte in working at intermediate temperatures, The SSZ cells were prepared by a co-firing process.
Titulo: Supported Zr(Sc)O2 SOFCs for reduced temperature prepared by slurry coating and co-firing

Sentencas: Ni-SSZ cermet anode was adopted to support the cell, Thin green electrolyte films of SSZ were prepared onto Ni-SSZ anode substrate by a dip-coating technique and then co-fired.
Titulo: Supported Zr(Sc)O2 SOFCs for reduced temperature prepared by slurry coating and co-firing

Sentencas: Pt-SSZ cermet was used as cathode.
Titulo: Supported Zr(Sc)O2 SOFCs for reduced temperature prepared by slurry coating and co-firing

Sentencas: The cell was tested with humidified hydrogen as fuel and air as oxidant at 700, 800 and 900 degreesC.
Titulo: Supported Zr(Sc)O2 SOFCs for reduced temperature prepared by slurry coating and co-firing

Sentencas: The test cell showed power density of 0.38 W/cm(2) at 700 degreesC and 0.8 W/cm(2) at 800 degreesC.
Titulo: Supported Zr(Sc)O2 SOFCs for reduced temperature prepared by slurry coating and co-firing

Sentencas: The cathodic resistance of the test cell amounted about 80% of the total resistance at 700 degreesC as was identified by air AC impedance measurement.
Titulo: Supported Zr(Sc)O2 SOFCs for reduced temperature prepared by slurry coating and co-firing

Sentencas: It was found that cell performance would be improved by controlling microstructure of the anode substrate and increasing the cathode activity.
Titulo: Supported Zr(Sc)O2 SOFCs for reduced temperature prepared by slurry coating and co-firing
